bug.author: Keks244
bug.summary: "Template Matching" tutorial page -> Can't choose another image
bug.description:
I can't upload another image to your template matching tutorial page. <denchmark-link:https://docs.opencv.org/master/d8/dd1/tutorial_js_template_matching.html>https://docs.opencv.org/master/d8/dd1/tutorial_js_template_matching.html</denchmark-link>
Other tutorial pages are working fine for me. Please Fix :)

comments.comment: Hello I am really interested in contributing to openCV. Can i be assigned this issue?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/alalek>@alalek</denchmark-link> I got the solution. Please can i be assigned this issue?

hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/alalek>@alalek</denchmark-link> , I found the problem. Its pretty simple just a typo and a missing function call can you assign it to me ? Thank you for anticipation!! ðŸ˜„

No need to be assigned in case of small fixes. Feel free to prepare Pull Request with adding reference on this issue (so other can see that). BTW, Avoid mistakes like this one: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/pull/19228>#19228</denchmark-link>
